content:
I made a base template PR to expose the openAPI link on the Capstatements page. But Lloyd bring up a couple of good points.

  • first is this a good idea?- are they useful or still a work in progress. I toyed with them a while back but did not get very far.
  • Is it always produced for all CapStatements
  • What if it is an example would it be produced then as well ( not my use case but could be that somebody wants to do that)

@Grahame Grieve ?
I would certainly like to see them exposed. For a lot of people, "FHIR doesn't try to work with OpenAPI" because the IGs don't expose the openAPI documents.
yes, there are a few issues with them, though the few issues are pretty hard to avoid. Still, the only way to get them fixed is to have people running into them
they do get generated for example capability statements as well
